snippet.title: Game Master Plus — out now!
snippet.description:
Game Master Plus is an expanded and streamlined RPG-Maker-MV remake of Game Master (RPG Maker VX Ace, 2014).

Accompany Elsa, a spirited teen-age girl who has just moved to a small town called Home with her mother. Set out on a quest full of mysteries to unravel: Why does the ancient game board in the Slumberwoods work only for you? What does the Elder know about it? Who was that guy they call the 'Wizard', and could he maybe still exist?

Game Master Plus is out now! Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/950890/Game_Master_Plus/

Website: https://www.greatpotiongames.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/greatpotiongames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/greatpotiongames

Trailer by Alexander Häger.
